004package main;
005
006import kut.Path;
007import kut.File;
008
009/** Constants. */
010public class Cts {
011  private Cts(){};
012
013  /** Application name. */
014  public static final String appName = "MarketModelsJ";
015  /** Application version. */
016  public static final String version = "2024.03";
017  /** Data version. */
018  public static final String dataVersion = "2024.03";
019  /** Data path. */
020  public static final String dataPath = Path.cat(
021    File.home(), ".dmJavaApp", "KutPost", appName
022  );
023  /** Results directory. */
024  public static final String resultsDir = Path.cat(dataPath, "results");
025  /** Directory of historic quotes tables. */
026  public static final String quotesPath = "/dm/KtWeb/dmcgi/Market/quotes";
027  /** Steps number to calculate simulations */
028  public static final int simulationSteps = 20;
029  /** Minimum sales to compute results. */
030  public static final int minSales = 40;
031
032  // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
033
034  /** Number of global ranks. */
035  public static final int globalRanks = 5;
036  /** Number of dates to calculate statistics. */
037  public static final int statDates = 24;
038  /** Number of dates to save. */
039  public static final int historicDates = (statDates + 1) * 2;
040  /** Period names. */
041  public static final String[] periods =
042    new String[]{"daily", "weekly", "monthly"};
043  /** Values types. */
044  public static final String[] types =
045    new String[]{"prices", "accs", "refs"};
046  /** Statistics names. */
047  public static final String [] stats =
048    new String[]{"price", "average", "crrAverage", "deviation"};
049  /** Investor model base. */
050  public static final String modelBase = "SSBB0";
051}
